title: gSampler: General and Efficient GPU-based Graph Sampling for Graph Learning

methods.name: gSampler
methods.description: General and efficient GPU-based graph sampling method for graph learning

results.baseline: native implementations of PyG and DGL

summary: gSampler is a GPU-based graph sampling method integrated with DGL, achieving 1.62-2.52x speedup over DGL. It utilizes 94.2-98.0% of GPU streaming processors via super-batch sampling, reducing GPU memory usage while maintaining efficiency.

title.snippet: gSampler: General and Efficient GPU-based Graph Sampling for Graph Learning

methods.snippet: gSampler: General and Efficient GPU-based Graph Sampling for Graph Learning

results.snippet: source at https://tinyurl.com/29twthd4. 1 Introduction Nowadays, graph learning models, such as graph embedding (GE) [3] and graph neural networks (GNNs) [64], play a vital role in supporting important applications such as recommen- dation
